name: Top Banana Smoothie
description: What's more delicious than a chocolate dipped banana? Only a chocolate dipped banana with nuts on top! Here it is in smoothie form for your breakfast enjoyment.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups (16 ounces) whole milk or unsweetened almond milk, such as Silk brand
1/2 cup cocoa nibs (about 2 ounces), plus additional for garnish
1 pinch Maldon sea salt, plus additional for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Add milk or almond milk, frozen bananas, pecans, cocoa nibs, cinnamon, Nutella, and pinch of salt to a blender. Turn blender to low and blend until roughly pureed, about 30 seconds. Gradually increase heat to high and blend until smooth, about 1 minute longer.
Serve with a sprinkle of cocoa nibs and sea salt on top.
